lead_paragraph: The crash occurred around 11:30 a.m. in an olive grove between Andria and Ruvo di Puglia, in the southern region of Puglia.

headline.print_headline: Trains Crash Head-on in Italy, Killing at Least 25
headline.main: Train Crash in Italy Leaves at Least 25 Dead and Dozens Injured

snippet: The crash occurred around 11:30 a.m. in an olive grove between Andria and Ruvo di Puglia, in the southern region of Puglia....
abstract: Passenger trains collide on track in Puglia region of southern Italy, killing at least 25 people and seriously wounding dozens more; inspectors and local prosecutors are investigating circumstances that led to crash.
